Articles.Content: I make a hill in my mind. It's invincible, and I'm king of it. You can't get it. Ha ha. (Unless you go inside my mind, but the sheer amount of weirdness in my mind would kill you. It's that weird.)

I delete all the weirdness in your brain and then put you in the Matrix. 

My in a mind which is in a Matrix hill.

I nuke everything and end all hills.

My hill on a hill on a hill on a mountain on Moho orbiting Sol with Jeb's boosters and the Kraken protecting me.
I have ADHD. To end the weirdness in my brain. you'd have to kill me. So my brain still exists, along with its hill and its weirdness. ADHD FTW!

I build a new hill ontop of your hill, burying you alive. 

My sad hill.

I restart all hills.

My hills.

I crush your hill with a class E asteroid. 

My asteroid hill.
I make a separate hill. I will love it, and care for it, and call it my own. I also make several hills for everybody else, so everyone can have a few hills. my hill. your hill***s***Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

I build a hill on the poles of Mars.

My Martian poles hill.

I call a Geneva convention for hills in a valley. No poison gas, no nuclear orbital bombardment or orbital bombardment with anything other than pure kinetics. No hacking into suns. Signing is optional, but encouraged. I gave everyone a hill or two...

I restart the universe.

My unknown location hill.

I de-restart the universe. 

My de-restarted Martian pole hill.

> 
> I de-restart the universe. 
> My de-restarted Martian pole hill.

and your de-restarted other hills that I gave you and everyone else. and my little hill of my own.

I capture all the hills you made.

My Martian pole hill and lots of other hills.

I kill everything everyone and everyhill.

My unknown location hill.
I'm an omnipotent being, demigod, blood of the pharoahs, dragon rider, dragon born, jedi, wizard, spartan, etc. I'm still alive. I make myself a valley. My valley. (plot twist!)
I find and hunt down all landscapes. My Eve sea-level hill.
I launch a bunch on LV-N Atomic motors into Kerbol, creating a black hole and destroying the entire Kerbol system. My point in space that used to be the site of a hill.

I restart Kerbol.

Then I punch you to a new solar system without anyplace to make a hill.

My hill on the surface of Jool.

I kindly ask you for my hill back.

My hill on Jool.

I ask the FTL Kraken to take you.

My hill on Tylo.

I make my own democratic civilization on a hill on laythe.

My hill on Laythe.
I make a hill on Laythe near yours and ask to join your civilization. Our hills on Laythe.

I build a hill on Jool, so I can spy on all of the hills on Laythe.

(don't question it)

My Joolian hill.

I implode Jool, destroying all the hills on all its moons as well as any Joolian hills. 

My hills on Jool, Laythe, Vall, Tylo, Bop, and Pol.
